attributes.action: Petition to show public support of the Guardsman who protected the Queen  - Demanding NO FURTHER ACTION be taken by the MOD
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to demand that the Ministry of Defence immediately cease and desist any action against the Guardsman who the public feel took appropriate action in defending the Queen and her residence at Buckingham Palace.

We understand there may have been a complaint made by the offender but it is the public view appropriate action was taken and that this soldier carried out his duties as instructed.

We are outraged that people seek to deliberately undermine our armed forces personnel and ridicule it in such a manner. This small and unwanted incident is just another example of people testing barriers and we need to send a strong clear message that our armed forces are unwaveringly supported in their duties.
